Text: have the beastie boys gone instrumental

fhilbert:

The Beastie  Boys have made quite a few instrumental albums over the years. My favorites are "In Sound from Way Out!" and the "Root Down" LP. 

Did you also know that they were once a punk band? Check out the album "Pollywog Stew", Kate Schellenbach of the band Luscious Jackson was their drummer back then. (http://www.beastiemania.com/whois/luscious_jackson/)

Check out the Beastie Boys' entry at Discogs: http://www.discogs.com/artist/Beastie+Boys

I'd invite you over to my house to check out my extensive Beastie vinyl (I buy everything on vinyl) collection but you might be a Fed. ;)
